message.content:
1. SIRT can be repeated once in case of recurrence.
2. TACE is repeated every 6 weeks.
3. TACE is continued until no viable tumor tissue is detected by MRI.
4. TACE is stopped if contraindications prohibit further treatment.

messages.content:
Statement: SIRT could be repeated once in case of recurrence; while, TACE was repeated every 6 weeks until no viable tumor tissue was detected by MRI or contraindications prohibited further treatment.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
